item.title: Overgrown weeds along the pathway near bus stop, 1st September
item.description:
Very overgrown weeds along a fair stretch of that road. It’s a cause for concern because it is a very busy road and it leads to the bus stop. As it’s blocking over half the pathway making it unsafe for prams and people with disabilities. Issue has been getting worse over the past few months and seems to have been missed in the post summer verge clean up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount ofFly tipping, 1st September

item.title: SUGGESTION - would you add a 50 repeater ?, 1st September
item.description:
Hello, would Highways consider ADDING a '50' repeater sign to the B4634 / staverton road, just after the staverton traffic lights, northbound ? The first repeater sign is past the motorway flyover bridge. The gateway signs are so close to the traffic lights that, especially turning left from Churchdown, it's difficult to see them. Many thanks ! Nat (Churchdown driving instructor).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is located on the top of the railway bridge. It’s slanted and looks as if it will fall onto the road below., 31st August
item.description:
Railway sign that indicates height of bridge for road users is hanging off and looks as though it is going to fall on the road below, potentially causing an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
